text: lest perhaps there should be among you a man or a woman, a family or a tribe, whose heart is turned away this day from the Lord our God, to go and serve the gods of those nations. And there should be among you a root bringing forth gall and bitterness.

segments.text: lest perhaps there should be among you a man or a woman, a family or a tribe, whose heart
is turned away this day from the Lord our God, to go and serve the gods of those nations.
And there should be among you a root bringing forth gall and bitterness.
